name: shouldAddProductsOnProductsPageAndRemoveThemInCart()
description: Validates that the state of cart icon on Products Page changes accordingly when adding items to the cart. After entering the cart, removing the items, and going back to Products Page, the cart icon should be showing that the cart is empty.
descriptionHtml: Validates that the state of cart icon on Products Page changes accordingly when adding items to the cart. After entering the cart, removing the items, and going back to Products Page, the cart icon should be showing that the cart is empty.

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Adding and Removing Products from the Cart

labels.name: story
labels.value: User adds 2 items on the Products Page and then enters the Cart and removes them.
